statements.select: SELECT [LeaveId], [LeaveTypeId], [EmployeeId], [LeaveDate], [LeaveRange], [LeaveText] FROM [dbo].[Leave] where [EmployeeId]=#empid# and ([LeaveDate] between #startdate# and #enddate#) order by [LeaveDate] asc

SELECT count(DutyDate) FROM HrDailyEmployeeAttendInfo WHERE EmployeeId =#employeeId# AND YEAR(DutyDate) = #year# AND MONTH(DutyDate) =#month# AND convert(varchar(2), month(DutyDate))+'/'+ convert(varchar(2),day(DutyDate)) in (SELECT holidaydate FROM HrSpecificHoliday)
select * from Leave where employeeId=#employeeId# and year(LeaveDate)=#year# and (#month# is null or month(LeaveDate)=#month# ) order by LeaveDate desc
SELECT * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmpID# AND Leave.LeaveDate = #LeaveDate#
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmpID# and year(LeaveDate)=#year# ORDER BY Leave.LeaveDate DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmpID# and year(LeaveDate)=#year# AND LeaveDate > #LeaveYear# ORDER BY LeaveDate
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmpID# and year(LeaveDate)=#year# AND LeaveDate < #LeaveYear# ORDER BY LeaveDate asc
SELECT * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmpID# AND Leave.LeaveDate = #LeaveDate#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmployeeId# AND LeaveDate = #startDate#
statements.select: SELECT * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId in ($empid$) AND LeaveDate > #startdate#
SELECT * FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId IN ($emps$) AND Leave.LeaveDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# ORDER BY EmployeeId,LeaveDate ASC
statements.delete: DELETE FROM Leave WHERE EmployeeId = #EmployeeId# AND LeaveDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate#
statements.select: SELECT count(1) FROM Leave l LEFT JOIN LeaveType lt ON lt.LeaveTypeId = l.LeaveTypeId WHERE year(l.LeaveDate) = #year# AND MONTH(l.LeaveDate) = #month# AND l.EmployeeId = #empid# AND lt.LeaveTypeName LIKE '%隔周%'

SELECT cast(t.LeaveTypeName AS varchar),Cast(isnull(a.LeaveRange,0) AS varchar)+'天,' FROM LeaveType t LEFT JOIN (SELECT LeaveTypeId,sum(CASE when l. LeaveRange = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0.5 END) AS LeaveRange FROM Leave l WHERE Year(l.LeaveDate)=#DateTime# AND l.EmployeeId=#Employeeid# GROUP BY l.LeaveTypeId) a ON t.LeaveTypeId=a.LeaveTypeId ORDER BY t.LeaveTypeName FOR xml path('')
